summary: This is a custom player home that has plenty of storage, all of the crafting stations you need, a bedroom for 2 children, a masterbedroom for the Dragonborn and their spouse, a playroom for children and a bathing room.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]!PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE YOU ASK ANY QUESTIONS![/size]

[b][u]!You NEED Hearthfire for this mod to work!

[/u][/b][size=2][u]Update Log 8/1/15;[/u] Fixed bad stairs.

[/size][u]Please track this house if you are interested in using it![/u] I will be updating it soon, currently I am working on fixing the flickering lights and may possibly add different versions of the house that have more beds for more children( For you guys out there that have more than 2! )  and I may turn the Guest room into a follower room if there are any of you guys out there that have lots of followers instead of just one. Thank you for reading! 

This is my third house mod and I think it's the best one yet!

[u][size=4]♦This house includes;[/size][/u] 

•Playroom for the children
•Reading Areas for the Adults
•Beautiful family Dining Room
•Spacious Kitchen
•Master Bedroom for Dragonborn and Spouse
•HouseCarl Bedroom ( Or it can be a spare bedroom! )
•Bedroom for 2x Kids
•Bathroom
•Basement with plenty of storage and an Enchanter and Alchemy Station AND a trophy room!
•Fishing Area at the front of the house
•All other Crafting Stations just outside of the house!

[u][size=4]♦Credits!

[/size][/u]Thanks to Farinelli for letting me use his shield
Thanks to Oreo for making beautiful rugs
Thanks to Insanity for his folded blankets, towel rack and soap resources!
Thanks to Blary for his Booksets Resource
Thanks to DarkFox for his CK tutorials on Youtube
Thanks to berticus0001 for the teddy mesh and textures
Thanks to jacknifelee for Toy Story resources
Thanks to Strotis for their Kitchen Tools resources
Thanks to Ax for the paintings resource ( I created new paintings and used his frame texture and mesh )
Thanks to Oaristys for their Modders Resource Packs

[u][size=3]♦I have taken many pictures for you to see! [b]You will be able to see Vanya Sulie on your map and you can travel to it immediately. It is on the left and slightly above the 3 Guardian Stones near Riverwood!
